event.title: Keynote by FSFE president Georg Greve at CeBIT, Hanover, Germany
event.body: Georg Greve, president of the FSFE will deliver a keynote speech entitled "To dare more freedom" at the CeBIT in Hanover (Hall 6, Open Source Forum). The keynote is scheduled on 3 March 2009 at 11:00hrs and will be delivered in English.
